briefTitle: Effects of Exenatide Long-Acting Release on Glucose Control and Safety in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus(DURATION - 1)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open-Label, Multicenter, Comparator-Controlled Study to Examine the Effects of Exenatide Long-Acting Release on Glucose Control (HbA1c) and Safety in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Managed With Diet Modification and Exercise and/or Oral Antidiabetic Medications
summary: A Randomized, Open-Label, Multicenter, Comparator-Controlled Study to Examine the Effects of Exenatide Long-Acting Release (LAR) on Glucose Control (HbA1c) and Safety in Subjects with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Managed with Diet Modification and Exercise and/or Oral Antidiabetic Medications.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in HbA1c From Baseline to Week 30
